mapper.insert: insert into project_transfer_notify_request (service, sign_type, sign, mer_id, version, order_id, mer_date, trade_no, mer_check_date, ret_code, ret_msg, request_time, response_time, request_data, response_data) values (#{service}, #{signType}, #{sign}, #{merId}, #{version}, #{orderId}, #{merDate}, #{tradeNo}, #{merCheckDate}, #{retCode}, #{retMsg}, #{requestTime}, #{responseTime}, #{requestData}, #{responseData})
mapper.select: select * from project_transfer_notify_request where status=0 order by requestTime asc;
mapper.update: update project_transfer_notify_request set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
